ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") tabela = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.Definition.ToString() handle = widget.Breadcrumb.Parent.Entity.Handle
if (tabela == "CN_ADITIVOOBJETOS"): from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNAditivoObjeto widget.Hidden = CNAditivoObjeto.PeriodosMostrarTab(handle) elif (tabela == "CN_CONTRATOOBJETOS"): from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContratoObjeto widget.Hidden = CNContratoObjeto.PeriodosMostrarTab(handle) else: from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNAditivoNovosObjeto widget.Hidden = CNAditivoNovosObjeto.PeriodosMostrarTab(handle)
